title: The Great cover-up
creator_credit: Sonya Friedman, Henriette Montgomery and Texture Films
brief_description: Uses live action and animation to present observations about dress, including its significance as a means of self-expression, its role as part of the total design of an age, and the way in which it reflects prevailing political and social issues.
creator_credit_for_label: Sonya Friedman, Henriette Montgomery and Texture Films
